ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You look like
you’re doing great today!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I bet the two of us could get along with any
person or Pokémon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
Oh, I just remembered! I already had some
of these, so here—you can have this!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
It might be useful someday. It wouldn’t hurt to
have on hand!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! There’s something
I wanted to give you!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
I was trying to think of something you’d need,
and I landed on this. I hope you like it!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
It feels a little awkward saying this face-to-face,
but...
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I hope we can hang out more together!
Like friends forever!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I’ve got so many things to talk to you about,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
You’re my friend, my rival, and my favorite person
to talk to, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
You sure I can have this?
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2301_01_10: You got this for me? Thanks! I love it!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll bring you something too.
Just you wait, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2402_01_10: See you later! It was fun talking with you!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Hm... So that’s how you think, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Well, this was fun! I feel like I understand you
better now. Let’s talk again sometime!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I feel so relaxed here. It’s like I’m in a
secret base.
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I bet if we took a break here to chat with
everyone, our fatigue would melt away!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
When I was exploring Hoenn, all I could think
about was moving forward, so I was completely
absorbed in Pokémon battles.
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But here on Pasio, I’ve had more leeway to see
what’s going on around me, so I’ve been wanting
to try something new!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
I wanna challenge myself and get to know a lot of
people—just like you!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
At first, I thought I’d be contest training all by
myself, so I was glad for your help.
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
After all, it’s nice to have friends and rivals
around—just like when May and Wally were
there for me!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
When the time comes for us to enter a contest,
let’s give everyone a surprise!
ch0019_00_yuki_salon/8003_0701_04_10: We’ll show them our true strength as secret rivals!
